Continued 
/circle5Avoid taking any medication prescription or non prescription in the first 12 weeks of pregnancy unless safely prescribed for you and necessary 
/circle5See your GP if you are taking any prescribed medication 
/circle5Be careful with aromatherapy oils & alternative therapies 
/circle5Use Paracetamol for analgesia 
/circle5If you need help, be honest,  ask straight away 
Caffiene
